mapper.select: SELECT userId As userId , userName As userName , userPhone As userPhone , Verify As Verify FROM member
mapper.insert: insert into product (proCode , proName , proPrice , proStock , proDescription) values (#{proCode} , #{proName} , #{proPrice} , #{proStock} , #{proDescription})
mapper.select: SELECT proCode As proCode, proName As proName, proPrice As proPrice, proStock As proStock, proDescription As proDescription FROM product
